doc.title: Tale of Sasquatch
doc.plot: "Sasquatch" chronicles the misadventures of Rupert (or Woopert, as he would say) as he begins his search in the woods for food, since "winteh is c-c-coming and f-f-food will soon be scahce." Frankly, though, Rupert could be anybody: The story is really about feeling like there's something "wrong" with you -- and discovering that it's okay to be different.
